title: Neighbours (the remix) - David Jolly (Siesta)
abstract: The Screen Lounge component of The 2004 Show: New Visual Cultures
description: Too hot to sleep I took a walk during siesta through two Barcelona suburbs, Pedralbes and Les Corts. Adjacent to each other only in location. I wandered through the tree lined streets and deserted apartment blocks, 'pry to close (a tip from a local) and they'll escort you out of there'. The only signs of humanity amongst the empty sound of sprinklers were the pool cleaners, gardeners and maids, quietly maintaining an order. A contrast to the jubilant cries of children playing after school, rushing through the sun filled holes knee down on skateboards, playing soccer on a concrete field defined by its long shadows cast by the superstructures of high density public housing, their home.
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: Compilation title; B1005948; Neighbours (the remix): 2004 New Visual Cultures; Active; 12 Feb 2004-08 Jun 2004
